text:
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
Richard B. Hull, Executive Director
January 16, 1962
William Harley, President
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
The attached excerpt from page 313 of the UNESCO CHRONICLE,
Vol. VII, No. 8-9 (August-September) under the heading of
Mass Communication, describes the upcoming meeting for which
you sent information to M. Blin at RTF, Paris. I gathered
from a conversation in Paris that the UNESCO boys sometimes
try to keep these meetings as an "in-party11 leaving out
France, the U.S., etc., on various occasions. I was advised
it would bear watching—both this meeting and the policy in
general.
Sincerely,^
Richard B. Hull
RBH/mh
Enclosure—1
WOSU TELEVISION
2470 North Star Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
Teaching Aids Laboratory • Office of Seminars and Workshops • Ohio School of the Air • Video Recording • WOSU—WOSU-VM—WOSU-TV • Closed Circuit TV
